dsense.name: interact⇒
dsense.guideword: (person, animal: make contact) (互相沟通、交流、接触)

example.eg: The two pandas were put into the same enclosure to see if they would interact.
example.egtrans: 两只熊猫被放入同一个动物馆中，以便观察它们如何互动。

example.eg: Ken didn't like interacting with people, so he bought a house in the forest.
example.egtrans: 肯不喜欢与人交往，所以在森林里买了一栋房子。

example.eg: The graphic designer built a new user interface that was easier to interact with.
example.egtrans: 图像设计师创建了一个新的用户界面，让互动更加容易。
